      • addFeatureValuePairsToArrayList

        public static <V> void addFeatureValuePairsToArrayList(java.util.ArrayList<ComparablePair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> concatenatedList,
                                                       java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> mapToBeAdded,
                                                       java.lang.String prefix)
        This function adds the (feature, value) pairs from the @param mapToBeAdded to the @param concatenatedList, with the @param prefix added to the keys as prefix.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param concatenatedList
        Parameters:
        concatenatedList - the concatenated list, to which the (feature, value) pairs should be added
        mapToBeAdded - a map, which contains the (feature, value) pairs to be added to @param concatenatedList
        prefix - a prefix for the feature keys to be added to @param concatenatedList

      • convertFirstNElementsOfListToMap

        public static <V> java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> convertFirstNElementsOfListToMap(java.util.ArrayList<ComparablePair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> list,
                                                                                                        java.lang.Integer n)
        This function converts the first N elements of a list with (feature, value) pairs to a HashMap.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param concatenatedMap
        Parameters:
        list - the list to be converted
        n - the number of elements to be used from the beginning of a list
        Returns:
        the resulting map
